column1: Digras (Hindi दिग्रस) is a town and a municipal council in Yavatmal district in the state of Maharashtra

column3: 122. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Digras is connected to major cities in the Maharashtra State by road. MSRTC buses run from Digras to Mumbai
column17: Mahagaon and Indore. Roads in Digras are not yet equipped with traffic signals.
